_sText:
A fix version of mg_knife_multi, i decided to keep the old because of a minigame that is removed in this version.

The fixes are:

-Made two holes from the top to the cave in the grass level (lvl1)
-Glass level (lvl4) is replaced by a snow level (with snowflakes!)
-City level (lvl5)'s middle tower now has a thinner top.
-Speedrace level (lvl6) Has two walls that begins shrinking the level after 15 seconds.
-No fall damage
-Credits in the beginning of the map (Second screenshot)
-Now you cant camp on the edge of the room you fall out of in the start.
